workshop.applicationEvents

Class UserPasswordResetEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.springframework.context.ApplicationEvent
        • workshop.applicationEvents.UserPasswordResetEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class UserPasswordResetEvent
extends org.springframework.context.ApplicationEvent
    Events for Users who requested the password reset by getting the Uuid by email. This event initializes the process of creating and sending an email to that User.
    See Also:
